description:
Julia Roberts has signed on to star in her first-ever TV series.茱莉亚罗伯茨已确定出演演员生涯第一部电视剧。

Variety has confirmed that the Oscar-winning A-lister will star in a limited series, based on Maria Semple’s New York Times best-selling “Today Will Be Different,” which was released this fall.  Variety获悉奥斯卡奖得主将会出演由今秋发行的Maria Semple的获纽约最畅销小说的《Today Will Be Different》改编的电视剧。

“Today Will Be Different” is about a day in the life of Eleanor Flood, played by Roberts. The character is admittedly a bit of a mess, as she decides that today is the day to tackle the little things that she has been neglecting. Of course, life gets in the way of success as a fake-sick son, errant husband, and a former colleague with a bomb-dropping memoir derail her modest plan.《Today Will Be Different》讲述的是由罗伯茨饰演的Eleanor Flood生命里的一天。这个角色是公认的一团糟，所以她决定从今天起着手处理一些被她忽略的小事。当然生活妨碍她成功的还有她假虚弱的儿子，飘忽不定的丈夫以及总是让她的谨慎计划出岔子的同事们。

title: 女神茱莉亚罗伯茨出演生涯首部电视剧
